message: Where are the next billions going to come from? We're talking whole industries.
How much would you pay to eliminate to pay for the #1 cause of death for your kids? To work instead of commuting?
You would pay a lot.  In aggregate it's trillions.
Cloud of Governance - The choice of what government you have is separate from the place and the people who implement it.
It's a wonderful interesting time to be alive
